item.description:
Join me for an easy paddle up the Merrimack river to memorial field. It's Old Homes day and there will be lots of things going on plus Food vendors so come hungry. We will paddle up and wander around for bit. Bring some money to eat. Yes the bathrooms will be open then.

There will be fireworks later at night if anyone wants to come back and hang with me. I live right up the hill from the park.

Any newcomers will get a paddle lesson from me and I will make sure you get a good start. When you arrive please see Rob and prepay for 3 hours. It's only $15. If we go longer you can catch up after, less time, the same. There are many boats to choose from. Singles and doubles from 10' to 14'. Do bring sunscreen and water and perhaps a bathing suit to swim in. Everyone gets a paddle and pfd.

This should be fun..See you there.

My phone 603-315-0275

Â 

Rain will cancel this event
item.how_to_find_us: meet me at the boat ramp
item.name: Easy kayaking & Suncook Old Homes Day
